frontmatter.title: Sheet
frontmatter.notes: Window-level edge-anchored content container with elevation shadow, with option to block content.

props.name: blocking
props.docblock: specifies whether the sheet provides a click-blocking scrim

description.text: specifies whether the sheet provides a click-blocking scrim

props.name: children
props.docblock: an element rendered inside the sheet

description.text: an element rendered inside the sheet

props.name: position
props.docblock: a string designating the sheet's position on the window

description.text: a string designating the sheet's position on the window

props.name: show
props.docblock: Boolean used to control whether the Sheet shows.

description.text: Boolean used to control whether the Sheet shows.

props.name: variant
props.docblock: a string designating which version of the sheet to show (light vs dark)

description.text: a string designating which version of the sheet to show (light vs dark)
